name: B.L.S.H.
description:
Buy Low Sell High A game by Ben Peterson

Addictive stock trading game with simple mechanics and a deep learning curve. Start with $100.00 and make as much as you can in seven days by flipping stocks for coin. Work your way up to your first million and the top of the online high score list as you learn the ins and out of BLSH.

Play In Browser Here 

The online high scores weren't working on itch.io, but you can still you can still play the web version on my personal website at benp.tech/blsh

If the web version doesn't work for you you can play the standalone on PC or Android.

Music by bensound.com

Always happy to hear your feedback
